info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 1:40PM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Moderate to heavy snow showers will impact portions Jefferson and southern Lewis and Clark Counties through 215 PM MST... At 136 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking snow showers along a line extending from 12 miles east of Lincoln to 12 miles northwest of Basin to near Silver Bow. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Moderate to heavy snow and half mile visibility. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hazardous driving conditions. Locations impacted include... Helena, Boulder, Lincoln, East Helena, Montana City, Wolf Creek, Basin, Wickes, Rimini, Alhambra, Corbin, Spring Meadow Lake State Park, Austin, Elkhorn State Park, Marysville, Craig, Elk Park, Clancy, Canyon Creek and Black Sandy State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
